channel.title: Kathmandu Nepal on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Kathmandu Nepal on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Reading and listening to the news in another language, Nepali edition
item.description: My command of the Nepali language is extremely limited, Somewhere on a bookshelf somewhere in the house I have this cookbook and its recipe for "gundruk", a fermented leafy vegetable that I have never tried to make and have not found to eat anywhere here locally. There is a lot of news from Nepal as a result of the tragic earthquake, and the thought goes to try to read at least a tiny piece of the news in the original language.
